title: Tiger Udyr with Black Cleaver
body: Is one of the most broken champion/item combos I've seen in the history of this game. Dude walked up to me and destroyed me as a full tank sion...

replies.body: Lol i still gotta try this ^^
Being full tank sion was your first mistake. your second mistake was expecting an udyr to not wreck you because even without the new black cleaver udyr was a tank destroyer.

not sure about broken, good yes. 
jax is pretty good with it too. his q and e apply it right off the bat. but you need a different mana item. 
how did he gap close with udyr with less movement? boots of swiftness, smite, or righteous glory?
